content: Just finished listening to Jane Mayer interview on NPR. She did a piece for the New Yorker on the Mercers, a super rich hedge fund family who helped Trump in August, as his campaign was floundering after the Manafort fiasco. It made me cry to think that there are a handful of rich idiots running our country right now. Mind you, it’s not like Hillary is not chummy with the rich. But these folks are mad. Breitbart, Bannon, the Mercer family; thank god for the subjects of this article. They got the guns, but we got the numbers…
